definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash

sentences.english: The same logic used to load the register is used to enable the tri-state buffers instead.
sentences.chinese: 裝載寄存器的邏輯同樣用於使能三態緩衝器。

sentences.english: The fetcher also generates a search address for output to the branch target buffer.
sentences.chinese: 指令讀取器亦產生搜尋位址輸出至分支目標緩衝器中。

sentences.english: Computers record in ation in the buffer .
sentences.chinese: 計算機在緩衝器中記錄信息。

sentences.english: Decompression routine needs some free space to use as a temporary buffer following the kernel image in RAM.
sentences.chinese: 是壓縮過得，而解壓縮函數需要一些空間作爲緩衝器。

sentences.english: Don't count on the bumper to hold up during a low-speed collision.
sentences.chinese: 別指望緩衝器會在低速碰撞時減緩衝擊。

sentences.english: The application of TOC in project management is called Critical Chain Project Management ( CCPM) , which controls the project by critical chain and buffer.
sentences.chinese: 它通過項目的關鍵鏈，並利用緩衝器來進行項目管理。

sentences.english: The bumper is below the two beams sticking out of the front.
sentences.chinese: 緩衝器位於前面的兩道橫樑之下。

sentences.english: The column must be pre-equilibrated in binding buffer before beginning sample application.
sentences.chinese: 列必須在開端抽樣應用之前在捆綁的緩衝器中被平衡。

sentences.english: Users who already purchased a bumper will be eligible for a refund.
sentences.chinese: 已經購買了手機緩衝器的用戶可以申請退款。

sentences.english: Don't count on the bumper to hold up during a low-speed collision.
sentences.chinese: 千萬別指望在低速碰撞中緩衝器會起到什麼作用。

sentences.english: Thus you needed to modify what was written into the buffer.
sentences.chinese: 因此您需要決定，在緩衝器中寫進什麼內容。

sentences.english: The V-shaped squeegee assembly is robust and equipped with bumpers .
sentences.chinese: 型的橡膠滾軸工作起來動力十足還裝有緩衝器。

sentences.english: The puppet buffer state keeps South Korea’s democracy far from China’s border.
sentences.chinese: 這個傀儡緩衝器可以讓韓國民主遠離中國邊界。

sentences.english: A static jitter buffer is hardware-based and is configured by the manufactures.
sentences.chinese: 靜態抖動緩衝器是基於硬件的，它是由廠家來配置的。
